column1:
Expression e = new Expression(""Round(Pow(Pi, 2) + Pow([Pi2], 2) + X, 2)""); 
     
      e.Parameters[""Pi2""] = new Expression(""Pi * Pi""); 
      e.Parameters[""X""] = 10; 
     
      e.EvaluateParameter += delegate(string name, ParameterArgs args) 
        { 
          if (name == ""Pi"") 
          args.Result = 3.14; 
        }; 
     
      Debug.Assert(117.07 == e.Evaluate());
